M. Papa Samba Diop est titulaire d’un Ma: Mr. Papa Samba Diop holds a Master 1 in computer engineering as well as a DESS in microenterprise management. With more than 8 years of experience as a senior data engineer, he has developed solid expertise in the design and deployment of data processing solutions, both in cloud and on-premise environments.
Certifié dans plus de six domaines clés,: Certified in over six key areas including Apache Spark 3.0 Python, Azure Data Engineer, Azure Power BI, Azure Data Fundamentals and IBM Enterprise Design Thinking, Mr. Diop is proficient in a wide range of cloud and analytics technologies such as Azure Synapse Analytics, Azure Databricks, Azure Data Factory, SQL Server, Oracle, Hive, HDInsight, Hortonworks, Cloudera, PySpark and Power BI. His training in MS Fabric and Synapse strengthens his ability to meet the complex digital transformation needs of businesses.
Reconnu pour sa polyvalence, son autonom: Recognized for his versatility, his autonomy and his sense of customer service, Mr. Diop demonstrates a great capacity for adaptation and remarkable team spirit. He stands out for his rigor, his speed of learning and his ability to solve complex problems, which makes him a strategic asset for any data management and development project.
